name: Travel Saboteur
description:
You are a saboteur that gets sent to a prison planet. Break the ship's systems to prevent your arrival there and force an emergency landing. 

You (green) have to avoid to be seen by the robots (red) while sabotaging the ship (via the white boxes). You can upgrade your speed (yellow) and sabotage value (purple). There are also consoles which disable the guard robots for some time (green boxes).

Use arrow or WASD to move.
